files.patch:
@@ -119,4 +119,2 @@
-doclet.UnknownTag={0} is an unknown tag.
-doclet.UnknownTagWithHint={0} is an unknown tag; the most similar tags are: {1}
-doclet.UnknownTagHelp=An unknown tag has been reported. Mistyped? \
-  Forgot to add a custom tag or register a taglet?
+doclet.UnknownTag=unknown tag. Unregistered custom tag?
+doclet.UnknownTagWithHint=unknown tag. Mistyped @{0} or an unregistered custom tag?

@@ -87,4 +87,2 @@
-dc.tag.unknown = unknown tag: {0}
-dc.tag.unknown.with.hint = unknown tag: {0}; the most similar tags are: {1}
-dc.tag.unknown.help = An unknown tag has been reported. Mistyped? \
-  Forgot to add a custom tag or register a taglet?
+dc.tag.unknown = unknown tag. Unregistered custom tag?
+dc.tag.unknown.with.hint = unknown tag. Mistyped @{0} or an unregistered custom tag?

@@ -74,1 +74,1 @@
-                    .checkUnique(Pattern.compile("unknown tag[.;:]")); // specific enough not to catch "helpful note"
+                    .checkUnique(Pattern.compile("unknown tag."));
@@ -82,1 +82,1 @@
-                .checkUnique(Pattern.compile("unknown tag[.;:]")); // specific enough not to catch "helpful note"
+                .checkUnique(Pattern.compile("unknown tag."));
@@ -229,6 +229,0 @@
-            new OutputChecker(Output.OUT)
-                    .setExpectFound(true)
-                    .checkUnique( /* "helpful note" */ """
-                            An unknown tag has been reported. Mistyped? \
-                            Forgot to add a custom tag or register a taglet?
-                            """);

@@ -1,1 +1,1 @@
-CustomTagTest.java:15: error: unknown tag: customTag
+CustomTagTest.java:15: error: unknown tag. Unregistered custom tag?
@@ -4,2 +4,1 @@
-Note: An unknown tag has been reported. Mistyped? Forgot to add a custom tag or register a taglet?
-CustomTagTest.java:16: error: unknown tag: custom.tag
+CustomTagTest.java:16: error: unknown tag. Unregistered custom tag?
@@ -8,1 +7,1 @@
-CustomTagTest.java:17: error: unknown tag: unknownTag
+CustomTagTest.java:17: error: unknown tag. Unregistered custom tag?

@@ -1,1 +1,1 @@
-CustomTagTest.java:17: error: unknown tag: unknownTag
+CustomTagTest.java:17: error: unknown tag. Unregistered custom tag?
@@ -4,1 +4,0 @@
-Note: An unknown tag has been reported. Mistyped? Forgot to add a custom tag or register a taglet?
